text: Michael Prinz von Preußen (22 March 1940 - 3 April 2014) or Michael, Prince of Prussia, was a German writer and royalty. He was the son of Louis Ferdinand, Prince of Prussia. He was the godfather of Georg Friedrich, Prince of Prussia. He studied in Freiburg. He wrote many biographies about his family members. He was born in Berlin. Michael died from an illness on 3 April 2014 in Thanheim, aged 74.Prinz Michael ist tot ==References== == Other websites == * Michael of Prussia * House of Hohenzollern Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Writers from Berlin
title: Michael Prinz von Preußen
